answers.answer: Hi!  I have a daughter who is 26 years old with a stomach problem no one can figure out.  She spent 120 days in the hospital and still no answers.  (60 at UPMC).  I would love to be able to help someone else.  There is a way to get to the Mayo Clinic, which is the best gastrointestinal hospital in the U.S.  Your doctor would have to be willing to help you.  Your doctor would have to call a "doctor referral number" and explain your situation and if the Mayo Clinic felt your situation was unique to their hospital, they would accept you, even if you have no insurance.  (Unfortunately, they were unable to help my daughter).  If you would like this number, answer back.  They are located in Rochester, Minnesota.  (I'm sure, your mother and myself would go to the North Pole if we knew we could find help for our children).
